scripts.dev:services: concurrently --kill-others --timestamp-format HH:mm:ss.SSS --prefix "{time} [{name}]" -n md,tf,ps -c blue,green,yellow "uv run --directory backend/services/market_data python -m app.server" "uv run --directory backend/services/transformer python -m app.server" "uv run --directory backend/services/persistence python -m app.server"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently --kill-others --timestamp-format HH:mm:ss.SSS --prefix "{time} [{name}]" -n web,api,md,tf,ps -c cyan,red,blue,green,yellow "bun run dev" "bun run dev:api" "uv run --directory backend/services/market_data python -m app.server" "uv run --directory backend/services/transformer python -m app.server" "uv run --directory backend/services/persistence python -m app.server"
scripts.migrate: bun run --cwd web --env-file .env.local bunx @better-auth/cli migrate && uv run --directory backend/api python ../scripts/migrate_services.py
